channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee, LLC -- Endpoint Product Removal Tool
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee, LLC -- Endpoint Product Removal Tool

item.title: CVE-2021-23879|2024-08-03T19:14:09.796Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- endpoint%20product%20removal%20tool
item.description: Unquoted service path vulnerability in McAfee Endpoint Product Removal (EPR) Tool prior to 21.2 allows local administrators to execute arbitrary code, with higher-level privileges, via execution from a compromised folder. The tool did not enforce and protect the execution path. Local admin privileges are required to place the files in the required location.
